title: Someone keeps logging into my account and impersonating me/losing my ranked games
body:
I sent a ticket for this problem twice and now it's getting more annoying... The hacker is now chatting with my friends, impersonating me!... Every night, when I go to sleep, I wake up to a match history full of games that I never played... This all started few days ago and I thought it was odd so I submitted a ticket.. I've tried changing my account password but I need to verify via Email some code thing but my email address was a school-given email and since i've graduated from that school last year, I no longer have access to it...SOMEONE is playing on my account and I can't change my information (email nor password)... I don't know if my account is compromised or not and I don't share accounts so please help me!

UPDATE #1: The 'hacker' removed all my friends and just dodged 2 Ranked Queues (Now I have 2 loses in my promos to Platinum)...

UPDATE #2: Just woke up... "They" have now lost my promos...

replies.body:
I strongly recommend continuing to work with our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to recover your account and take steps to secure your account (change email, add 2-step verification to your email, etc). This is the best route at preventing this from happening again.

Let me know if you have any questions.
My account is now permanently suspended now... I don't know why, but I can't access the email sent regarding the matter..
Is the email missing from your inbox? How are you encountering issues viewing the email?

Looks like he no longer has access to the email account

>R3SS4 (NA)  - 3 days ago
I can't... The email I verified my account with is no longer available for access...
Update: "They" have now lost my promos and got my account chat banned...
Now he has dodged 2 ranked queues and made me get 2 losses in my Platinum promos...
I can't... The email I verified my account with is no longer available for access...
Whoever it is, they deleted my entire friends list now...
